segments.text: Here , Ma ’ am please get on the stretcher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is Doctor Hawkins here ? She ’ s our doctor . We called her from the car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Calm down , sir . We ’ ll call her to make sure she ’ s on the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Sorry . It just came as such a surprise . The baby isn ’ t due for another two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long has she been in labor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . Are you planning on being in the delivery room , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please follow the nurse . She ’ ll get you ready .
segments.speaker: S2
